original_text: In Noah's time, people were eating their meals every day. Men and women continued to marry. They continued to do all this until the day when Noah went into his boat. Then it rained for a long time and there was deep water everywhere. The water killed all the people.
korean_text: 노아가 방주에 들어가던 날까지 사람들이 먹고 마시고 장가 들고 시집 가더니 홍수가 나서 그들을 다 멸망시켰으며

sentences.original_text: people were eating their meals every day
Men and women continued to marry
They continued to do all this
until the day when Noah went into his boat
Then it rained for a long time
and there was deep water everywhere
The water killed all the people
